name: Drunk Wizards
description: Drunk Wizards combines the fluidity and skill of an arena shooter with the lighthearted fun of a party game. It's intense FFA arena with different spells.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 760 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: My first review, but such a behavior from the dev(s) brought me to write it. Got the key legally from a giveaway. Revoked after a few hours due to of.....a mistake of the developer (???) Anyway...no single player, no servers, 2+players required even to start a game, a 'baby-boy with pencils' graphic in the main menu, no achievements, no trading cards.   NO, NO, NO. Stay away and avoid the developer(s), such a mistake might only means bad games...

- Max Resolution is 1728x1080(Black Bars) even though it says 1920x1080 - Need to have a connection to at least one other player to create a server but there is never anyone online mainly due to the fact that they gave out 20K+ keys and then ended up revoking them because of dumb marketing and being idiots. - No Multiplayer Servers Ever Online - No Single Player - Poor UI  + Good Music   Overall: 1/10 (Unplayable)
1) Buy two copies 2) Give one to friend 3) Not friends anymore  ggwp 10/10
